name: M's Barbers (UP2007874), Gabriel D.
description:
FULLSCREEN IS RECOMMENDED

"I like ya cut g" - @HeightFights

Welcome to M's Barbers! 

Somehow you landed a job at one of the most renown barbers around, which has access to exclusive ANTI BALDING technology, the Hair-GROW-5000™. 

Your goal is to get the job done with as little effort as possible. In order to do so, you will only use a single button!

  • Press and hold the Spacebar for 2-3 counts (indicated by a cyan/blue bar) to use your equipped tool. 
  • Press and hold the Spacebar all the way to swap your tools and to start the game.

-

This was made for a 5 day game jam.

Credits:

Music from https://freemusicarchive.org/

Spray/Scissors/Results Menu SFX from Breviceps & C-V @  https://freesound.org/

Stage 2 Music: Now Son, Podington Bear

Stage 3 Music: San Fran Interlude (Edit), Strobotone

Results Screen Photo: Chan Walrus, https://www.pexels.com/

Results Music: when, Stephan Siebert

Barber Pole: https://freesvg.org/

Other Assets/Voice Acting: Me!
